extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Ivanti EPMM to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Ivanti EPMM versions to the latest version to protect against CVE-2023-35078 and CVE-2023-35081.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are you using an unsupported version (prior to 11.8.1.0)?
Can you immediately upgrade to a supported version?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Ivanti RPM Fix for CVE-2023-35078
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the Ivanti-provided RPM fix for CVE-35078 if you cannot immediately upgrade.

extracted_playbook.title: Treat MDM Systems as High-Value Assets
extracted_playbook.description: Implement additional restrictions and monitoring for MDM systems as they provide elevated access to thousands of hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Mandate Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Mandate phishing-resistant multifactor authentication (MFA) for all staff and services.
